reference_summary:
COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B COSYMAY {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! This hair is gorgeous! Very nice thickness for a 20 inch and silky to the touch with so much body. The closure is perfect on this wig as well! Just to give you guys an idea of the body of this hair I uploaded videos but excuse me for still having my edges wrapped up lol Silky and Quality Hair! Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Ombre-Brown - 32inch 8Packs Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crochet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair (32 inch, T30) ToyoTree {'Package Dimensions': '16.5 x 7.2 x 2.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827816141'} [[VIDEOID:a3e393606a2e6dcef86b83ecc97fa694]] These are a very nice quality synthetic hair but they are small so I’d you’re going for a more fuller look I suggest getting more but if you’re going to space your crochets quite a bit or do individuals with these you should be okay. Very long too, but it’s great they give you a free gift of the crochet needle and jewels so no need for a store trip! Nice Quality Twist But May Need More Packs! lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman lorelo {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Perfect Heatless Curling tool! Nail Powder Vcedas 12 Colors Acrylic Powder Set for Nail UV Gel Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Vcedas {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Nice vibrant colors! Very inclusive powder set with so many colors to choose from! Can’t wait to try this on my nails!! You must buy the acrylic liquid and brush applicator separate! Colors are perfect! Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Keiby Citom {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} I used these to file at my acrylic nails in the application process and these did me wonders! Also I used this file it off when I’m removing my acrylic and it works perfect! Perfect For Natural and Acrylic Nails! Face and Body Paint Kit By Color Technik 24 Professional Oil Based Flash Colors, 2 Sets of 12 Color Palettes, 6 Paint Brushes 70 Stencils 2 Sponges Non-Toxic For Adults & Kids Halloween Painting Party Color Technik {'Brand': 'Color Technik', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 5 x 1 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CTFPS24'} Nice pigment in the colors. Nice and bright. Got this for Halloween so it’s going to do justice with my costume and my kids costume! Cant Wait Until Halloween. lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl lootaan {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'} Just what I expected from nails tips. These are the perfect quality and shape. Can’t wait to use these for my acrylic application! Just What I Needed!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user has broadened their interest to include face and body paint products, while consistently focusing on wigs (notably long, straight styles with bangs), crochet hair extensions, and nail care items, particularly acrylic products. The recent acquisition of high-quality artificial nails further emphasizes their commitment to nail aesthetics. 
- **Quality Expectations:** The user upholds high standards across all beauty products, prioritizing vibrancy, variety, and quality, while valuing functional tools that enhance usability during application.
- **Brand Familiarity:** The user positively engages with established beauty brands and is open to exploring new options, particularly in artistic and practical beauty supplies.
- **Visual Engagement:** Actively participates in the beauty community through multimedia content, sharing extensive reviews and personal experiences, reflecting their dedication to both hair care and creative beauty applications.
- **Attention to Detail:** The user demonstrates a keen focus on product features that optimize practicality and performance, including utility in artistic applications such as body painting and traditional hair and nail care.
- **User Engagement Style:** They provide enthusiastic, detailed feedback and insights on product usage, which enhances the community experience.
- **Rating Trends:** The user consistently awards positive ratings for products that meet or exceed their expectations, underscoring their strong appreciation for quality, functionality, and aesthetic appeal in diverse beauty products.

Overall, the user exemplifies a keen interest in high-quality beauty options and actively contributes valuable knowledge within the community.
